39411057.review:
A short and educational little game that is mainly meant for children. Play as a seed pod and move from your small island to the mainland.

Basically, the game wants you to move from left to right. It's all about reaching a forest. After every move you are given a chance to decide what you wish to become. A coconut or a berry? The former can destroy a small dam while the latter will be eaten by a bird. 

The hand-drawn landscapes are really great and it's good that while you can make a bad decision (i.e. you do not advance) you cannot really lose and need to start over. A little music would have been great but this is a good pastime anyway, plus, it is completely free.

39369290.review:
Росток - небольшая, приятная игрушка за которой можно хорошо провести 10-15 минутный перерыв, собрав еще одну "идеальную игру" в профиль, ибо достижения здесь легкие.

Изначально игра была сделана на flash, но в Стимовской версии она переделана под Unity. Мы играем за росток, который хочет попасть в лес, дабы стать там могучим дубом. Росток умеет превращаться в увиденные деревья, и на выборе правильного дерева строится игровая механика.

Картинка в игре нарисована судя по всему от руки, под неё есть простая мелодия.

Как итог: короткая приятная игра на небольшой перерыв. Ничего особенного, но ощущения от неё положительные. Собирателям "идеальных игр", проходить!
8 дубов из 10
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1126011506

Sprout é simples e espetácular.

Pontos Negativos: 

1- O game é muito curto.

Pontos Positivos:

3- A dificuldade do game está relativamente boa, não é tão fácil e nem super difícil, em certas partes só tem que pensar um pouco.

アドベンチャーゲーム。
プレイヤーは植物の若芽として右側にあるオークの木までたどり着くのが目的のアドベンチャーだ。道中、ヤシの木やタンポポ、果物の木、豆の蔓になる能力を獲得して、それらを使用してゴールを目指す。短い内容の割には試行錯誤していく楽しみがあり、味のある手書きイラストの雰囲気が良い。短時間で遊ぶには良いゲームだ。

39232553.review: 虽然只是一款仅有十几二十分钟的小游戏，但是总体玩下来流畅自然，每每看见种子能生长出新的植物、当看见新生长的植物或依靠环境或改变环境去走向更远的时候，都会会心的笑起来，真的是充满了童趣，同时也不乏一些小幽默，仅仅是十几分钟的游戏却难得给我提供了加班时间中的放松，没有紧张刺激，没有血腥暴力，没有相互竞争，只有慢慢的飘向目的地，真的超棒这种感觉

39193171.review:
Historia: Eres una semilla la cual se quiere convertir en una bellota y listo eso es todo, consiste en hacer todo un recorrido por medio de puzzles hasta poder llegar aconvertirte

Dificultad: El juego realmente no es tan dificil se puede lograr en tan solo 20 min maximo, tampoco tiene unos puzzlestan dificiles pero tienes que saber que decision tomar para poder llegar al final

La jugabilidad: Saber como jugar es super simple y con tan solo el inicio sabes todo lo que tienes que hacer es click

Te recomiendo este juego?: Este no es "el gran juego" pero tampoco podemos desmerecer con unos graficos echo a mano y desarrolado por tan solo 2 personasen Flash y Unity es un buen trabajo, si lo que quieres un juego entretenido con buena historia no te recomendaria aunque siendo corto puedes darle un vistazo, pero si lo tuyo es obtener logros este juego lo tienes que terminar, solo con terminar el juego ganaras 3 logros asi que si tu onda va por ahi te invito a jugarlo y si quieres saber como lograrlo puedes pasar por mi guia del juego.

39183106.review: 이 게임은 마치 하나의 동화이야기를 보는 듯하다. 매우 짧은 시간의 플레이타임이었지만 이 시간 안에서 제작자의 상상력으로 만들어진 작은 요소들과 대화를 하는 듯한 느낌이었다. ‘이렇게 하면 어떨까?’라는 생각을 자문자답하지 않고 아기자기한 색연필의 연출로 답을 알려준다. 갈수록 많아지는 선택지는 문제에 도달할 때마다 궁금증을 만들어내는, 그리고 뒤로가서 새로운 선택지를 사용해보는 그런 재미가 나의 마음 속에 와닿는다.

39182509.review: 画风蛮可爱的，挺简单的一个小游戏，游戏还告诉我们，大鸟果然社会

39182192.review: Apesar de pequeno, é muito bom, adoro jogos indie xD. Tem uma história simples, mas claro, está óbvio a mensagem que o game nos passa: Nunca desista dos seus sonhos. Mesmo que vc seja uma mera sementinha de coqueiro, vc pode crescer e se tornar o que quiser :D Recomendo.

39179184.review: What a hidden gem! This painstakingly handmade art had me fully in awe. The methodically work of Jeff Nusz and Mindful Mammoth has created a true masterpiece that leaves food for thought. On the surface the game might seem fun, relaxing and whimsical, but underneath lies a much deeper message, about self-improvement and blooming through every facet of life. A very touching hand drawn puzzle-adventure that I would fully recommend to everyone.

39159916.review: It's a really little game but I enjoyed playing it. Puzzle Solving is one of my hobbies and that's why I think everyone out their should play this game. It's really small and good.

39157028.review:
Захватывающий побег побега неизвестного, сначала, происхождения.

Вас ждет недолгое, но содержательное приключение, в котором вам удасться переплыть Тихий Океан, научиться летать, побывать несколько раз в желудке овцы и птиц, разрушить коммуникации местных жителей, совершить невероятный прыжок на трамплине и, наконец, вернуться домой, к семье.

Игра наглядно показывает, что, порой, встречаются такие интересные персонажи в нашей жизни, которые вносят изменения в нас самих, мы чему-то учимся у них. И лишь применив новые знания и навыки, при этом не забывая то, что было тебе известно, ты сможешь продвинуться вперед, а до тех пор, останешься на месте.

39156687.review: Simple, and also easy. A good change of pace game.

39153689.review: Króciutka, ale ciekawa historyjka nasionka. Jeśli masz wolne pół godziny to jest to gra dla Ciebie

39145377.review:
Игра рассказывает о путешествии зернышка кокосовой пальмы, которое задумало стать дубом. Несмотря на весьма необычную мечту зернышка, играть в игру интересно, тем более, что она небольшая. На прохождение уходит примерно минут 20. Когда играешь в неё, кажется, что игра простая простая и не ждешь каких-то интересных решений задач, которые стоят на пути зернышка. Тем не менее, сталкиваясь с какой-то проблемой, почесав репу и потыкав несколько раз однообразные действия с удивлением находишь решение проблемы, которое изначально не было очевидным.
Рекомендую обязательно ознакомиться. Был бы не против поиграть ещё в что-нибудь подобное.

39117789.review:
Sprout é um jogo que retrata a trajetória de uma semente que está tentando se tornar uma Nogueira, quando ela é um coqueiro no meio do nada.

O jogo é bem curto, bem fácil de platinar e é interessante. Essa "trajetória" da semente poderia passar diversas mensagens e reflexões que poderiam ser usadas na vida real(Como: "Não desistir dos seus sonhos", "Fazer qualquer coisa para completar seus sonhos", etc). 

Um dos únicos problemas é que o jogo não é tão "enigmático" e ele acaba sendo bem fácil de completar(o que é benefício para quem gosta de platinar jogos, mas tudo bem). 

A arte do jogo, embora possa parecer infantil(o que é considerado fofo), é muito boa e única ao jogo. O jogo não possui uma Soundtrack mas os SFXs de "ações" no jogo são ótimos, você nem percebe algum erro neles e acaba se submergindo ao jogo.

Recomendo o jogo pelas conquistas, pela arte e pelas mensagens. Como é grátis e é curto, vale muito a pena experimentar.

39106396.review:
씨앗의 모험.

여러 종류의 열매로 변신할 수 있는 씨앗을 조종해 목적지까지 무사히 도달해야 하는 퍼즐 게임이다. 10분에서 15분 정도면 무난히 끝낼 수 있는 무료 게임이다. 색연필 풍의 그림체가 어딘가 저렴해 보이면서도 묘하게 정겹게 다가온다.

게임이 워낙 짧아 게임 자체에 대해선 딱히 할 말은 없다만, 여러 종류의 나무로 자랄 수 있는 씨앗을 통해 상황에 맞는 열매가 되어 게임을 진행한다는 컨셉만큼은 꽤나 신선하게 느껴진다. 이 발상을 잘 활용할 수 있으면 제법 참신한 게임이 하나 나올 법 한데 말이다.

할 거 없을 때 10분 정도 플레이하고 해치우기 좋은 무료 게임.

39104165.review:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wLOnn2iZhiQ
(If the video is removed: Ed, Edd n' Eddy clip having Edd saying "Acorn BECOMES A TREE!")

[h1]I'm a little sprout, and when I grow up, I want to be AN OAK!!![/h1]

[i]Sprout[/i] is a short hand-drawn puzzle game about a sprout born from a coconut that must adventure to realize its dream to become a mighty oak tree.  Fortunately, this little sprout is immortal and is able to become any plant it meets...like a stem cell.

The art style may seem subpar, but it has a nice charm to it, especially since everything has been drawn by hand.  This gives the game a charm that can be enjoyed by children and adults. (But mostly children)

Given this 12 minute adventure, there isn't too much else that can be said about this game.  Do I recommend it?  Of course!  It's a 12 minute game that can grant a user an easy 100% and actually plays pretty decent.  The dev was clearly creative and I respect his choice in creating this game.  Well done!

9/10  Sprout...BECOMES AN OAK!  Sprout...BECOMES OAK!!!  Sprout.....OAK!!!!!!!!!!!

39096724.review:
A cute short puzzle game you can play with your kids. Story is about a sprout that wants to move from a spot to another by learning from the other plants how to become a coconut to roll on the ground. A berry to let the birds eat you and transform you to the other area. A dandelion which can float in the air, and finally a bean to climb the mountains. 


Pros:
+Cute hand drawn artwork.
+Kids friendly.
+Not very easy and boring puzzles.
+Free game.
+Steam achievements.

Cons:
-Short game (Some may not like how short it is)
-No music.

39505074.review:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Butter two 9-inch-round cake pans and line the bottoms with parchment paper; butter the parchment and dust the pans with flour, tapping out the excess.

Whisk 3 cups flour, the baking powder and salt in a bowl until combined. Beat 2 sticks butter and the sugar in a large bowl with a mixer on medium-high speed until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes. Reduce the mixer speed to medium; beat in the eggs, one at a time, scraping down the bowl as needed. Beat in the vanilla. (The mixture may look separated at this point.) Beat in the flour mixture in 3 batches, alternating with the milk, beginning and ending with flour, until just smooth.

Divide the batter between the prepared pans. Bake until the cakes are lightly golden on top and a toothpick inserted into the middle comes out clean, 30 to 35 minutes. Transfer to racks and let cool 10 minutes, then run a knife around the edge of the pans and turn the cakes out onto the racks to cool completely. Remove the parchment. Trim the tops of the cakes with a long serrated knife to make them level, if desired.
